info.title: PatientPassport API
info.description: A comprehensive API for managing patient medical records and hospital operations

post.summary: Register a new user (Patient, Hospital, Doctor, Receptionist)
post.description: Register a new user with email and password. Creates both user account and role-specific profile (Patient/Hospital/Doctor/Receptionist). Requires OTP verification to complete registration. Admin role is system-only and not available for public registration.

role.description: User role - determines what profile is created. Note: 'admin' role is system-only, not available for registration

nationalId.description: Required for patient registration - National ID number

dateOfBirth.description: Required for patient registration - Date of birth

contactNumber.description: Required for patient registration - Contact phone number

emergencyContact.description: Required for patient registration - Emergency contact information

hospitalName.description: Required for hospital registration - Hospital name

licenseNumber.description: Required for hospital/doctor registration - License number

specialization.description: Required for doctor registration - Medical specialization

201.description: User registered successfully. OTP sent to email for verification. Use /api/auth/verify-registration-otp to complete registration.
